name: Run to the future
description:
I made this for the miniLD53. It's rather fun for a short period of time.

This endless runner will have you escaping from zombies while trying to jump over random gaps.

- Controls -

Space to jump (hold for longer jumps)

R to restart

- Tips -

Zombies spawn behind you and run toward you. Jump over them and use them to take out the graves.

Sometimes slowing down isn't a bad thing. If you are going to fast slow down!
